section.p: The three mutineers are terrified that you will call your current crewmen to back you up. ‘I’ve got a few barnacles need scraping of my new ship’s keel, Mister Burkitt,’ you tell your one-time cabin boy with a crooked smile.
He and his shipmates get up quickly. ‘Good to see you’re well, skipper. No hard feelings, eh?’ they mutter, pressing a purse with into you hand.
You watch the three men hurry off. You doubt if you’ll see them again. Lose the codeword Church and .
